name: Hardy Veteran
originalText: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

rulings.text: Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2 for the entire duration of your turn. If it’s dealt damage or gets -X/-X until end of turn, those will wear off before your turn is over.
